dict.acceptation: 抵押；抵押单据，抵押证明；抵押权，债权；

sent.orig: The mortgage is a mortgage option to only pay for the interest for specific mortgage terms.
sent.trans: 您的摊销时间表是一个打破你将支付的利息以及本金每月在您的家庭的购买。

sent.orig: A junior mortgage is a mortgage that is subordinate to any other mortgage of record.
sent.trans: 初级抵押贷款是抵押贷款是从属于任何其他抵押的记录。

sent.orig: For Mortgage Lenders, Mortgage Bankers& Homebuilders the National Mortgage Complaint Center Suggests; Clean Up Your Act.
sent.trans: 对于房屋贷款公司，银行和房屋建筑商，全美房地产贷款投诉中心有话对他们说：做事规矩点。

sent.orig: Mortgage Refinance Calculator-Should I do a Mortgage Refinance?
sent.trans: 转按揭计算器-我应该怎样做抵押融资？

sent.orig: One way to make capital available for new loans is to sell mortgage backed mortgage-backed securities.
sent.trans: 要想获得新的贷款，一种方法就是出售房产抵押担保证券。
